column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=1 .
#Text=Introduction
#Text=The increasing resistances of pathogenic bacteria are one great problem for worldwide health policy , because it means a threat of humanity .
#Text=Pathogenic bacteria can be found in human surroundings , and drinking water may be contaminated with bacteria in developing countries .
#Text=In the last century sufficient antibacterials were available to effectively treat infections with those various bacteria .
#Text=Beside the standard antibacterials like penicillin , reserve antibiotics have been discovered from natural sources and were resynthesized by industrial companies .
#Text=However , an abuse and overuse of those antibiotics is one of the reasons for the present crisis with resistant bacteria .
#Text=In the case of viral infections , antibiotics are often prescribed .
#Text=In the case of existing sensitivities of bacteria towards standard antibiotics , novel reserve antibiotics have been used in clinics .
#Text=Therefore , bacteria with contact to those antibiotics like Staphylococcus aureus on human surfaces like skin developed early resistances .
#Text=A misuse of antibiotics is also present in the mast of poultry .
#Text=Those antibiotics contaminate the environment by animal excretions .
#Text=Finally , industrial waste of antibiotic production is pumped into rivers in producing countries like India .
#Text=Moreover , bacteria develop resistance mechanisms that allow the spread of resistance genes via plasmids , and also between different species .

#Text=One other problem that contributes to the present antibiotic crisis is the fact that pharmaceutical companies recently announced that they would no longer invest in the development of novel antibiotics .
#Text=The financial outcome of the development of life style drugs is much better than that of antibiotics .
#Text=Antibiotics have to be cheap for a use in low-income or developing countries .
#Text=Innovative but vague approaches to find novel antibiotics have been an influencing of the bacterial gene expression to modify the bacterial metabolism .
#Text=Such a modified metabolism might lead to novel metabolic products which have to be identified and tested for their antibacterial properties .
#Text=Methods to alter gene expression may be varied growth conditions or a microbial co-culturing of various bacteria or of fungi and bacteria .
#Text=Other sources for the identification of novel antibiotics have been plants , marine invertebrates and insects or amphibia .
#Text=Isolated antimicrobial peptides from such sources have long been favored .
#Text=However , they still hamper with various problems like proteolytic instability , short in vivo half-lives , insufficient solubility and a poor bioavailability .
#Text=Alternative small-molecule antibacterials are rare .
#Text=They own promising properties for an oral use , and are not expected to show problems reported for those antimicrobial peptides .
#Text=Presently , such small-molecule antibacterials that result from synthetic chemistry are unknown to emerge as a novel antibacterial compound class .
#Text=We gained access to two novel structurally-related classes of small-molecule antibacterials by the reaction of substituted indoles and thiophene dicarbaldehyde .
#Text=Therefore , various composed hybrid molecules were yielded from those indoles and benzothiophene .
#Text=Hybrid molecules of antimicrobial active antibiotics , or antifungal drugs have recently been reviewed .
#Text=They mostly consist either of two different antibiotics or antifungals that are connected by a linker like a simple carbon chain .
#Text=So fluoroquinolone-oxazolidinone hybrids reached clinical trials and novel 1 , 2 , 3-triazole antifungal hybrids with 8-aminoquinoline or dioxolane have recently been reported .
#Text=Our novel compound classes were tested against prominent Gram-positive bacteria that are associated with severe hospital infections by Staphylococcus and Enterococcus strains .
#Text=We identified first lead compounds with promising activities and confirmed the in vitro results first in the in vivo studies for selected derivatives .
